originalText.text: Dr. Kramer is an excellent doctor that I feel at ease around and fully trust with my healthcare. She is calm, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. Her office staff is excellent, professional, and polite. I never have to wait more than 10 minutes in the waiting room, and the office is always super clean. Dr. Kramer is one of the BEST doctors in all of Manhattan, and I feel very thankful to have her as my doctor. Highly recommend. 10 out of 10!

originalText.text: Dr. Jamie Kramer is an amazing doctor. Honestly the entire practice is wonderful. Dr. Kramer took care of me and my baby girl inside my belly throughout my entire pregnancy. This was my first pregnancy and Dr. Kramer was patient and listened to all my questions and concerns at every appointment. I highly recommend Dr. Kramer. I will certainly be going back as my family grows.

text.text: Dr. Jamie Kramer is an amazing doctor. Honestly the entire practice is wonderful. Dr. Kramer took care of me and my baby girl inside my belly throughout my entire pregnancy. This was my first pregnancy and Dr. Kramer was patient and listened to all my questions and concerns at every appointment. I highly recommend Dr. Kramer. I will certainly be going back as my family grows.

originalText.text: I really wish I had the same experience as others here. The practice itself is really nice and I will likely come back to see another doctor. They see you on time, or even before your appointment. Overall, I had 2 instances where I noticed that my medical record was not reviewed prior to my arrival. As a result, I had to go through a doc that didn't know I was in to make sure my MMC had passed completely and instead asked me excitedly to be ready to hear a HB, and then didn't know I had been to her before on my second pregnancy. Both of these instances could've easily been avoided if my medical record had been reviewed 5 mins before entering the room. Instead, I had to endure 2 awkward instances where I felt like I didn't really matter, and was just another patient of the mill.

originalText.text: If I could give this review 10 stars I would. I arrived 5 mins early for my appointment and was taken in before even sitting down! The staff were super friendly, from the reception desk to the med techs and phlebotomist. Dr. Kramer is exceptional. She answered all questions, was thorough and kind. I know I’m in the best hands with this practice.

originalText.text: The staff is warm and knowledgeable and welcoming. The waiting room is very comfortable. Dr Kramer is one of the best doctors I know. She is thoughtful and thorough and remembers details that most doctors don’t take the time to mention. I highly recommend her and her practice!
